Title: An Adventure in Space and Time
Actors: David Bradley, Ross Gurney-Randall, Roger May
Plot: An actor tapped by a succession of hard-man roles and a wannabe producer frustrated by the TV industry's glass ceiling find unlikely hope and unexpected challenges in the form of a Saturday tea-time drama, time travel and monsters.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Award1 win & 9 nominations total
